Alex is happy to return to the Apple Hill stage, where she has previously been seen as Betty Gow in Violet Sharp, Murphy in Suite Surrender, the title character in Alice in Wonderland, and other roles. Other favorite recent roles include Elinor in Sense and Sensibility with The Heritage Players and Julia in The Wedding Singer with Greensburg Civic Theatre. Alex holds two Bachelor of Music degrees in vocal performance and music therapy and is a board-certified music therapist, professional musician, voice and piano teacher, music director, and artist. She will be pursuing her MFA at Savannah College of Art and Design this fall. www.alexandra-swartz.com.
